app_details.title: My M-Pesa Lesotho
app_details.description: M-Pesa is the largest and most innovative mobile financial service in Lesotho. By launching the M-Pesa App, we want to give you a superior M-Pesa experience when you send money to loved ones, or paying for goods and services from anywhere in the world with ease. M-Pesa is a convenient and secure way to transact , and it works offline, for free! Access to your finances anytime, anywhere Send money from anywhere in the world with ease, by selecting the contact from your phone book or your favourites. Check your balance account with a single tap, it is FREE to use Control your recent transactions, by viewing and downloading the mini statements Access the app in your preferred language, app supports English and Sesotho Pay easily Make your payments to businesses and merchants in seconds. Buy Airtime and bundles seamlessly for you and your friends Cash out from the largest network of agents Withdraw or deposit your money from any of our +5000 agents across the country. Use the App offline, without data costs. Even if you don’t have access to an internet connection (Wi-fi or data), you can still transact with no extra costs. For that, when you are launching the App, you have to give SMS permission. In your device, you also have to go to Settings, then select “M-Pesa App” and switch on the “SMS permissions”, including Premium number permissions. It’s secure Every time you log in, you will need to use your M-Pesa 4 digit PIN. This is the only official and authorised App for accessing your M-Pesa account in Lesotho. Vodacom Lesotho cautions customers against downloading or attempting to use of any other App that purports to offer easy access to M-Pesa. Don’t share your PIN with anyone else. Still have questions? If you have any queries or feedback about this App, please do get in touch by sending an email to customercare@vodacom.co.ls or calling customer care by dialling 114 from your Vodacom handset.
app_details.descriptionHTML:
M-Pesa is the largest and most innovative mobile financial service in Lesotho.

By launching the M-Pesa App, we want to give you a superior M-Pesa experience when you send money to loved ones, or paying for goods and services from anywhere in the world with ease.

M-Pesa is a convenient and secure way to transact , and it works offline, for free!

Access to your finances anytime, anywhere
Send money from anywhere in the world with ease, by selecting the contact from your phone book or your favourites.
Check your balance account with a single tap, it is FREE to use
Control your recent transactions, by viewing and downloading the mini statements
Access the app in your preferred language, app supports English and Sesotho

Pay easily
Make your payments to businesses and merchants in seconds.
Buy Airtime and bundles seamlessly for you and your friends

Cash out from the largest network of agents
Withdraw or deposit your money from any of our +5000 agents across the country.

Use the App offline, without data costs.
Even if you don’t have access to an internet connection (Wi-fi or data), you can still transact with no extra costs. For that, when you are launching the App, you have to give SMS permission. In your device, you also have to go to Settings, then select “M-Pesa App” and switch on the “SMS permissions”, including Premium number permissions.

It’s secure
Every time you log in, you will need to use your M-Pesa 4 digit PIN.

This is the only official and authorised App for accessing your M-Pesa account in Lesotho. Vodacom Lesotho cautions customers against downloading or attempting to use of any other App that purports to offer easy access to M-Pesa. Don’t share your PIN with anyone else.

Still have questions?
If you have any queries or feedback about this App, please do get in touch by sending an email to customercare@vodacom.co.ls or calling customer care by dialling 114 from your Vodacom handset.
app_details.summary: The M-Pesa App: An application that gives you a transformative experience.
